SELECT r.race_no raceNo, r.bus_no busNo, r.route_no routeNo, t.route_start routeStart, t.route_end routeEnd, t.route_interval routeInterval, t.bus_stop busStop, b.bus_limited busLimited FROM race r JOIN route t ON r.route_no = t.route_no JOIN bus b ON r.bus_no = b.bus_no WHERE 1=1
LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM race r JOIN route t ON r.route_no = t.route_no JOIN bus b ON r.bus_no = b.bus_no WHERE 1=1
SELECT bus_no busNo, bus_driver busDriver, bus_limited busLimited FROM bus WHERE bus_no NOT IN (SELECT bus_no busNo FROM race)
SELECT route_no routeNo, route_interval routeInterval, bus_stop busStop FROM route WHERE route_no NOT IN (SELECT route_no routeNo FROM race)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO race (race_no, bus_no, route_no) VALUES (#{raceNo}, #{busNo}, #{routeNo})
